name: Octopus-Adventure
overview: Octopus-Adventure is a German language game in which you play Andover in a quest for gold. Your goal is to retrieve the gold from the bottom of the sea and return it to your boat. However fish, and a giant octopus are in your way. Catch and return the gold before the fish or Octopus tentacles catch you. The game was developed by Michael Wellenhofer and published in CPU 1984/06.
